thread.title: Napoli eye summer move for Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic? Thursday's transfer gossip
thread.title_full: Napoli eye summer move for Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic? Thursday's transfer gossip

author: Football Spy
title: Napoli eye summer move for Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic? Thursday's transfer gossip
text:
Sport Napoli eye summer move for Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic? Thursday's transfer gossip PLUS: Manchester City and Chelsea target set for Serie A stay, Sampaoli favourite for Barca and PSG hint at big-money move Share Ibrahimovic has yet to agree to a second year at Manchester United (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get football   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic is a 'dream' transfer target for Napoli, according to the Serie A side's president. 
The Swede's current deal at Old Trafford expires at the end of the season but he has an option for a further year. But that has not stopped Aurelio De Laurentiis from declaring his interest. 
"My dream signing? I always try to go forward with what I have," De Laurentiis told Napoli Today . 
"One that I would like, though, is that giant who is at Manchester United now. I had him as a dinner guest in Los Angeles and he's incredibly nice, even though he always seems angry. 
"You know the one I'm talking about, right?" 
It's probably not Marcus Rashford. Thursday's stories from the Mirror 
Ronald Koeman is on Barcelona’s shortlist to become their next manager. The Spanish giants are preparing to axe under-pressure Luis Enrique this summer in the wake of Tuesday's 4-0 humiliation to PSG. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Ronald Koeman on Everton's top four chances Share this video Watch Next 
Tottenham star Dele Alli is a £100million player as he's better than Manchester United's world-record buy and fellow midfielder Paul Pogba, claims former Spurs manager Harry Redknapp . 
West Ham are resigned to taking a big hit on £6million flop Arthur Masuaku in the summer. The error-prone French defender has flopped since joining from Greek club Olympiacos in August. 
Galatasaray's former Arsenal forward Lukas Podolski is set to become the latest star to earn a big money move to Asi a - but NOT the Chinese Super League. The Germany international Podolski is reportedly joining Japanese side Vissel Kobe in the summer. Podolski is set to move east (Photo: Anadolu Agency/Getty) 
Manchester United had a near-world record £85million offer for Thomas Mulle r turned down this summer, says the forward's Bayern Munich executive vice-chairman Jan-Christian Dreesen. News stories from other newspapers and websites 
Manchester City and Chelsea target Paulo Dybala is 'very close' to penning a new contract at Juventus (Daily Mail) Dybala looks set to stay in Turin (Photo: EPA) 
Sevilla boss Jorge Sampaoli favourite to replace Luis Enrique at Barcelona (Telegraph) 
PSG director of football Patrick Kluivert has hinted that the French champions could move for Barcelona superstar Lionel Messi (ESPN) poll loading Will Zlatan Ibrahimovic be a Manchester United player next season? 500+ VOTES SO FAR
